job_details.Vacaturetitel: AI-First Software Engineer III, Trilogy (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you a talented software engineer who regularly leans on AI tools to reach superhero status? We're looking for someone eager to leverage AI to craft intelligent, forward-thinking solutions to bring our 100+ product portfolio into the modern world.

   At Trilogy's core, we have a strategic product line reshaping industries and how people work and learn. Here's a glimpse of our strategic product line:
     * Jive: A leading platform for organizational collaboration. Dive into developing innovative features that integrate people and systems seamlessly, setting new standards in connectivity and communication.
     * Influitive: A trailblazing platform empowering brand advocates. Utilize your expertise in data and analytics to craft unique user experiences, optimize advocate activities, and foster a vibrant, interactive community that drives brand loyalty and engagement.
     * ACRM: A CRM solution integrating sales, marketing, and support into a sophisticated, user-friendly interface. Your role is pivotal in offering actionable insights and a holistic customer view that propels customer satisfaction and loyalty to new heights.

   In this role, you can expect to navigate the complexities of integrating AI-driven solutions into these exciting product lines, offering unique opportunities to innovate. Your expertise will guide the development of scalable, serverless applications and innovative features, leveraging the full potential of cloud-native technologies.

   What We Offer:
     * Cutting-edge Tech Work: Engage with technologies like AWS in both new and legacy codebases.
     * AI Beyond Buzz: Embark on a generative AI journey, enhancing engineers' focus on design and strategic implementation.
     * Global Engineering Community: Collaborate with a skilled, diverse global team of tech experts., * Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.
     * Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement.
     * Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications.
     * Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Routine Monotony: We keep cumbersome infrastructure tasks to a minimum so you can focus on creating innovative solutions.
     * Endless Meetings: We value your expertise in development over sitting in meeting rooms. Expect more coding, less talking., * Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services.
job_details.full_text:
AI-First Software Engineer III, Trilogy (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Are you a talented software engineer who regularly leans on AI tools to reach superhero status? We're looking for someone eager to leverage AI to craft intelligent, forward-thinking solutions to bring our 100+ product portfolio into the modern world.

   At Trilogy's core, we have a strategic product line reshaping industries and how people work and learn. Here's a glimpse of our strategic product line:
     * Jive: A leading platform for organizational collaboration. Dive into developing innovative features that integrate people and systems seamlessly, setting new standards in connectivity and communication.
     * Influitive: A trailblazing platform empowering brand advocates. Utilize your expertise in data and analytics to craft unique user experiences, optimize advocate activities, and foster a vibrant, interactive community that drives brand loyalty and engagement.
     * ACRM: A CRM solution integrating sales, marketing, and support into a sophisticated, user-friendly interface. Your role is pivotal in offering actionable insights and a holistic customer view that propels customer satisfaction and loyalty to new heights.

   In this role, you can expect to navigate the complexities of integrating AI-driven solutions into these exciting product lines, offering unique opportunities to innovate. Your expertise will guide the development of scalable, serverless applications and innovative features, leveraging the full potential of cloud-native technologies.

   What We Offer:
     * Cutting-edge Tech Work: Engage with technologies like AWS in both new and legacy codebases.
     * AI Beyond Buzz: Embark on a generative AI journey, enhancing engineers' focus on design and strategic implementation.
     * Global Engineering Community: Collaborate with a skilled, diverse global team of tech experts., * Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.
     * Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement.
     * Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications.
     * Conduct comprehensive code reviews and collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Routine Monotony: We keep cumbersome infrastructure tasks to a minimum so you can focus on creating innovative solutions.
     * Endless Meetings: We value your expertise in development over sitting in meeting rooms. Expect more coding, less talking., * Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the use of AI tools to enhance productivity and modernize existing products, rather than the core development or fine-tuning of AI models themselves. While it mentions 'generative AI journey' and 'AI-driven innovations', it lacks specific details on building, training, or deploying generative models, RAG systems, or advanced prompt engineering. The focus is on leveraging AI tools for coding, error detection, and feature development within existing software products, aligning more with an AI-assisted software engineering role rather than a dedicated GenAI or ML Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The job description mentions 'strategic product line reshaping industries and how people work and learn' and 'modernize our strategic product lines', indicating a need to understand the business context and align technical work with business goals.
job_tasks.phrase: strategic product line reshaping industries and how people work and learn

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'bring our 100+ product portfolio into the modern world' implies a strategic objective to update and improve existing products, requiring business understanding.
job_tasks.phrase: bring our 100+ product portfolio into the modern world

job_tasks.justification: The description highlights specific product lines (Jive, Influitive, ACRM) and their goals (organizational collaboration, empowering brand advocates, CRM solution), showing a need to understand these business domains.
job_tasks.phrase: Jive: A leading platform for organizational collaboration. Dive into developing innovative features that integrate people and systems seamlessly, setting new standards in connectivity and communication. Influitive: A trailblazing platform empowering brand advocates. Utilize your expertise in data and analytics to craft unique user experiences, optimize advocate activities, and foster a vibrant, interactive community that drives brand loyalty and engagement. ACRM: A CRM solution integrating sales, marketing, and support into a sophisticated, user-friendly interface. Your role is pivotal in offering actionable insights and a holistic customer view that propels customer satisfaction and loyalty to new heights.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'developing innovative features', 'craft unique user experiences', 'offering actionable insights and a holistic customer view', and 'developing scalable, serverless applications and innovative features', which are core software development activities.
The description explicitly states 'Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications.'
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications.

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services' points to software development tasks focused on improving existing products.
job_tasks.phrase: Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services.

job_tasks.justification: Conducting 'comprehensive code reviews' is a standard software development practice.

While the description states 'We keep cumbersome infrastructure tasks to a minimum', it also mentions 'leveraging the full potential of cloud-native technologies' and deploying 'serverless applications', which implies some level of operational awareness and deployment management.
job_tasks.phrase: leveraging the full potential of cloud-native technologies

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'deploy efficient back-end solutions' suggests involvement in the deployment aspect of software, which is part of operations.
The job description mentions 'generative AI journey' and 'AI-driven innovations', but it focuses on leveraging AI tools rather than developing or fine-tuning models.
The phrase 'AI-driven innovations' suggests using AI, but the context points to application rather than model creation.
The description mentions 'Utilize your expertise in data and analytics to craft unique user experiences' for Influitive, suggesting some data handling and analysis is involved.
job_tasks.phrase: Utilize your expertise in data and analytics

soft_skills.justification: The job description states 'Collaborate with a skilled, diverse global team of tech experts.' and 'collaborate with a global team to ensure best practices and high standards.'
soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with a skilled, diverse global team of tech experts.

soft_skills.justification: The phrase 'Expect more coding, less talking' implies a focus on efficient communication and collaboration, prioritizing development time.
The role is described as an 'AI-First Software Engineer' and mentions a 'generative AI journey', implying a need to adapt to and learn new AI technologies and approaches.
The phrase 'eager to leverage AI' suggests a willingness to learn and adopt new tools and methodologies.
The description mentions 'craft intelligent, forward-thinking solutions' and 'innovate', which requires problem-solving skills.

The focus on 'enhancing engineers' focus on design and strategic implementation' and 'improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.' points to a pragmatic approach to using AI for practical problem-solving.
soft_skills.phrase: improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.

soft_skills.justification: The job description emphasizes 'innovative features', 'innovate', and 'AI-driven innovations', indicating a need for innovative thinking.
The phrase 'take full responsibility for the quality and success of one's work' is implied by the focus on delivering robust applications and ensuring high standards.
soft_skills.phrase: ensure best practices and high standards

technologies.justification: The job description explicitly mentions 'Engage with technologies like AWS'.
The phrase 'cloud-native technologies' indicates familiarity with cloud services.
The mention of 'serverless technologies' points to specific cloud service architectures.
The phrase 'cloud services' is a general reference to cloud platforms.
The job description mentions 'Leverage cutting-edge AI tools' and 'generative AI journey', implying the use of tools and frameworks related to AI, though specific names are not provided.
The role is for a 'Software Engineer' and mentions 'coding', implying proficiency in at least one programming language, though none are explicitly named.
